title: Trump White House pressures Fed Governor Lisa Cook to go on leave as lawsuit looms
description: The comments from Kevin Hassett, President Donald Trump's top economic advisor, come amid a brewing legal battle between Cook and the Trump administration.
body: The comments from Kevin Hassett, President Donald Trump's top economic advisor, come amid a brewing legal battle between Cook and the Trump administration.

title: Cracker Barrel shares rise after restaurant chain gets rid of controversial new logo
description: Cracker Barrel shares rose more than 8% after the restaurant said it would scrap its new logo, amid criticism from social media users and even President Trump.
body: Cracker Barrel shares rose more than 8% after the restaurant said it would scrap its new logo, amid criticism from social media users and even President Trump.

title: Nvidia reports second-quarter earnings after the bell
description: There are two big questions about the future of Nvidia's data center business that analysts are looking at.

title: Taylor Swift's engagement is such a big deal it's moving the stock market. Here's what's moving

title: Two children dead, 17 people injured in Annunciation school shooting: Minneapolis police
description: President Donald Trump spoke to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz about the Annunciation school shooting, the White House said.

title: Gusto agrees to buy retirement plan provider Guideline
description: Gusto, which offers payroll and human resources software, has agreed to acquire Guideline, a startup that provides 401(k) plans to small businesses.
body: Gusto, which offers payroll and human resources software, has agreed to acquire Guideline, a startup that provides 401(k) plans to small businesses.

title: How Roth conversions could slash Trump's $40,000 'SALT' deduction for high earners
description: Trump's "big beautiful bill" increased the SALT deduction cap to $40,000. But Roth conversions could threaten the tax break for higher earners.
body: Trump's "big beautiful bill" increased the SALT deduction cap to $40,000. But Roth conversions could threaten the tax break for higher earners.
